sections.name: About Me
content: As a dedicated Java Developer, I specialize in building robust and scalable applications using modern technologies.
I have gained hands-on experience through various projects during my studies. I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and always follow best programming practices.

sections.description: Completed comprehensive software engineering program with focus on Java development, web technologies, and software project management.

project1.title: Industrial Catering System
project1.description: A comprehensive catering management system designed for industrial environments with contract management, meal ordering, and integrated payment processing.
project1.challenge: Industrial catering requires complex management of contracts, daily meal requests, menu planning, and payment processing. The system needed to handle multiple user roles and provide real-time updates.
project1.solution: Developed a full-stack web application using Spring Boot with microservice architecture, integrated VNPay for payments, and implemented role-based access control for different user types.
results: Complete contract and menu management system
Automated invoice generation and PDF export
project1.docsDescription: Complete technical documentation and user guide

project2.title: Web Ice Cream Shop
project2.description: A website for buying and selling ice cream recipes, fully integrated with inventory management, user authentication, and administrative access control.
project2.challenge: Creating a user-friendly e-commerce platform that could handle product management, order processing, and provide different access levels for administrators and customers.
project2.solution: Built using C# (.NET/ASP.NET), implemented Entity Framework for database operations, and created a responsive frontend with modern web technologies.
